title: The Last Dragon in the Cultivation World - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Cultivation   Dao Companion   Dragons   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Lack of Common Sense   Late Romance   Lazy Protagonist   Magic   Multiple Personalities   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Werebeasts
author: Marshmallow Bunny   拉棉花糖的兔子
description:
HA-HA-HA!
I, Xiaoshen, the great and mighty dragon have awoken! I might be the last dragon remaining in the world, but my power is unparallel… Huh?… Where’s my lake? Who took my water?! Yuling Sect’s Founder, Fang Cun?! I’ll go there, and make them repay every debt they owe me from thousands of years ago! 
Now, where’s my bride? …Huh? He blocked my power then disappeared? Humans can’t be trusted… One cheats you, the other steals your water… Hmm… This Shang Jiyu guy is not as bad as the others… But only sometimes, which is weird… 
Illiterate? You’re the illiterate one! No, I’m not an octopus. Not a Jiao either! And definitely NOT a turtle! 
I am… the last azure dragon of the cultivation world!>
